featured.text: At approximately the same time, the Earl of Sandwich popularized a new way of eating bread—in thin slices, with something (e.g., jam or cucumbers) between them.
Some regions prepare horses made of cucumbers and cows made of eggplants, hoping that the spirits will come back to Earth quickly, on a horse, and leave slowly, riding the cow.

definition.zh_def: 一種長形的綠色蔬菜，通常用於沙拉或醃製。
definition.en_def: A long green vegetable commonly used in salads or pickled.
definition.example: I added sliced cucumber to my salad for extra crunch.
